hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu ‘Ubaidah that ‘Abdullah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘The family of Muhammad has only a Mudd of food,’ or ‘The family of Muhammad does not have even a Mud of food.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَعِيشَةِ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The livelihood of the family of Muhammad (ﷺ)
